name: Bank Robbery Escape Mission
description:
Bank robbery is an unforgiven Crime and great sin anywhere and it must be stopped to bring the peace back. The same thing has happened in this city where a group of ruthless terrorists have decided to loot the money of the public from the banks. You shooter! They are more then what you can think of as they seems to be skilled in their crime and have ruthless intentions to do historic bank robberies.
Get into this situation by reaching the banks on time and conduct this special operation headed by the chief of the Police where you are to do counter shooting. You have some great range of weapons and you must complete the mission in time to kill these bad guys. They are a rival gang with a proper plan.

Now it is your job to save the looted money as well as shoot the enemy on the doors. The last but not the least, they have made women, children and men as hostages and they would use them as shields. It is your skill test now and show that you are the best commando to fight this bank robbery and can restore the peace of the town.

The Police team wish you best of luck for your mission and wants to see you back with the enemies in the chains and handcuffs. Be it dead or alive, just bring them!

Features
3D Game,
Real life sound effects,
Immersive city environment,
Snipers and weapons,
